value.name: Deploy-VM-Backup
value.description: Enforce backup for all virtual machines by backing them up to an existing central recovery services vault in the same location and subscription as the virtual machine. Doing this is useful when there is a central team in your organization managing backups for all resources in a subscription. You can optionally include virtual machines containing a specified tag to control the scope of assignment. See https://aka.ms/AzureVMCentralBackupIncludeTag.
value.displayName: Configure backup on virtual machines with a given tag to an existing recovery services vault in the same location
value.nonComplianceMessage: Virutal Machines must be backed up to Recovery Services Vault in the same location.

value.name: Configure-DiskAccess
value.description: Disable public network access for your managed disk resource so that it's not accessible over the public internet. This can reduce data leakage risks. Learn more at: https://aka.ms/disksprivatelinksdoc.
value.displayName: Configure managed disks to disable public network access
value.nonComplianceMessage: Public network access for your Managed disks must be restricted using Disk Access.

value.name: Deny-NSGRule-NoAllowList
value.description: Deny NSG Rules to specific Destination Ports if Source IP Ranges are not from allowed list (allowedIPRanges). For example, If centralized Bastion host is being utilized for RDP-SSH session to VMs then parameter "allowedIPRanges" should include Source IP Rnages of AzureBastionSubnet and parameter "destinationPort" should include ports 3389 and 22.
value.displayName: Deny NSG Rules to specific Destination Ports if Source IP Ranges are not from allowed list
value.nonComplianceMessage: NSG Rule denied as Source IP Range is not from allow list.

value.name: Deny-Route-NextHopVA
value.description: Deny route with address prefix 0.0.0.0/0 NOT pointing to the virtual appliance IP address. Both creating routes as a standalone resource or nested within their parent resource route table are considered.
value.displayName: Deny route with address prefix 0.0.0.0/0 NOT pointing to the virtual appliance IP address.
value.nonComplianceMessage: Route with address prefix 0.0.0.0/0 must point to valid IP Address of virtual appliance located in same Azure region.
